palermo.name: Palermo
palermo.intro: Sun, noise, and history in the same breath. Markets spill into Byzantine mosaics, and lunch stretches into twilight.

agrigento.name: Agrigento
agrigento.intro: Temples of stone above the orchards. The Greeks knew exactly where to put their columnsâ€”where the light falls longest.

noto.name: Noto
noto.intro: Honey-colored baroque dream. Every balcony curves like a smile, every church facade argues with gravity and wins.

siracusa.name: Siracusa
siracusa.intro: Marble and sea arguing about who came first. Ortygia whispers back through narrow alleys that time is a loop, not a line.

catania.name: Catania
catania.intro: Smoke from Etna curling into the espresso air. Lava-black baroque, fish markets at dawn, and a city that's been reborn more times than it can count.

taormina.name: Taormina
taormina.intro: Terraces of light, theater perched on the edge of myth. The Greeks put it here so you'd understand what 'view' really means.
